participant_1.background:
I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
My heart breaks when my grandchildren are sad.
I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others.

participant_2.background:
I live a life of fun and adventures with my friends and love capturing the moments with my iPhone
my weekends are filled with bird watching.
I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
I work a lifeguard during summer and help out at my family's restaurant during the off season.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
Hi, I like to take pictures of my friends and family. I also like to go to concerts and dance my heart out.
I love concerts too! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
Me too! I love going to concerts to see my favorite bands.
I have a lot of favorite bands, but one of my favorites is Green Day.
I love Green Day! I've seen them in concert a few times.
They're so good live! I'm hoping to see them again soon.
Me too! I've heard they're going on tour again soon.
That's great news! I'll have to keep an eye out for tickets.
Me too! I hope we can go together.
That would be fun! Let's keep in touch and see if we can work something out.
